title: Amazon bans the sale of Chromecast and Apple TV streaming devices
text:
Amazon bans the sale of Chromecast and Apple TV streaming devices 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
Amazon has announced that come October 29th, the company and third-party sellers will no longer be able to sell streaming devices that do no...
